samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The sample demonstrates about default functionalities of the Tab component (also known as Tabbed UI) which is navigation component in Vue platform.

samples.name: Orientation
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to customize the orientation of Tab component along with feasibility to customize the Tab header styles in Vue platform.

samples.name: Responsive Modes
samples.description: The sample illustrates that responsive mode of Tab component that aligns tab items in a scrollable or popup mode in Vue platform.

samples.name: Wizard
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to design a wizard-like application with the sequential action using the Tab component in Vue platform.

samples.name: Drag and Drop
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to reorder the loaded tabs and how to add a new tab from the external source.

samples.name: Keyboard Interaction
samples.description: This sample showcases the keyboard shortcuts applicable on Tab component in Vue platform.
